title: Remove references to older versions of Lucene in "per-release" documentation
description: Some of the documentation that is "per release" contains references to older versions, which is often confusing.  This is most noticeable in the file formats docs, but there might be other places too.

comments.content: Note, this issue should not effect code freeze as it is a doc change only.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll

comments.content: Looks like changes are only needed in fileformats.xml.  Patch attached.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
